headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: campaign_ids
parameters.description: A list of campaign IDs. Max size: 100.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log id of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: list
fields.description: A list of Smart+ Campaigns or Smart Performance Web Campaigns.

fields.name: advertiser_id
fields.description: Advertiser ID.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: Campaign ID.

fields.name: operation_status
fields.description: The status of the campaign. Enum values: ENABLE : The campaign is enabled. DISABLE : The campaign is disabled.

fields.name: campaign_secondary_status
fields.description: Campaign status (Secondary status). For the supported campaign secondary statuses for a certain primary status, see Supported secondary statuses for a primary status . It is equal to secondary_status in /campaign/get/ .

fields.name: is_smart_performance_campaign
fields.description: Whether the campaign is an automated campaign type. Supported values: true : The campaign is either a Smart+ Campaign or a Smart Performance Web Campaign. false : The campaign is a standard campaign type. Note : If is_smart_performance_campaign is true and objective_type is WEB_CONVERSIONS , you can confirm whether the web campaign is a Smart+ Web Campaign or Smart Performance Web Campaign by checking the returned spc_type .

fields.name: objective_type
fields.description: Advertising objective. Currently, we support APP_PROMOTION , WEB_CONVERSIONS , and LEAD_GENERATION .

fields.name: spc_type
fields.description: The web campaign type. Enum values: WEB_ALL_IN_ONE : Smart+ Web Campaign, where the supported optimization goals include Conversion, Value, Click and Landing page view. UNSET : Smart Performance Web Campaign, where the supported optimization goals are limited to Conversion, Value, and Click.

fields.name: web_all_in_one_catalog_status
fields.description: The status of catalog in the Smart+ Web Campaign. Enum values: OPEN : enabled. UNSET : disabled.

fields.name: app_promotion_type
fields.description: App promotion type. Currently, we only support APP_INSTALL .

fields.name: virtual_objective_type
fields.description: The new objective type. Enum value: SALES . Use this field to create a campaign with the Sales objective, the combined objective for Website Conversions and Product Sales objectives. Learn more about the Sales objective .

fields.name: sales_destination
fields.description: Sales destination, the destination where you want to drive your sales. Enum values: WEBSITE : Website. Drive sales on your website. WEB_AND_APP : Website and app. Drive sales on both your website and your app.

fields.name: campaign_type
fields.description: Campaign Type. Currently, we support REGULAR_CAMPAIGN and IOS14_CAMPAIGN .

fields.name: campaign_app_profile_page_state
fields.description: Indicates the status of the App Profile Page. Enum values: INVALID , UNSET , ON , OFF .

fields.name: is_advanced_dedicated_campaign
fields.description: Whether the campaign is an Advanced Dedicated Campaign. Advanced Dedicated Campaigns leverage advanced delivery models that benefit from real-time signals. Enum values: true , false .

fields.name: disable_skan_campaign
fields.description: Whether to disable SKAN (SKAdNetwork) attribution, Apple's conversion attribution solution for iOS campaigns. Enum values: true : To disable SKAN attribution. The campaign will not be bound by Dedicated Campaign quota limits and you will be able to retrieve Self Attribution Network (SAN) metrics for the campaign. However, you cannot retrieve SKAN reporting metrics for the campaign. Learn more about SAN integration . false : To enable SKAN attribution. The campaign will be bound by Dedicated Campaign quota limits and you will be able to retrieve SKAN metrics for the campaign.

fields.name: bid_align_type
fields.description: The attribution type for the Dedicated Campaign. The type determines which attribution network the target CPA ( conversion_bid_price ) or ROAS ( roas_bid ) is based on. Enum values: SAN : SAN. SKAN : SKAN.

fields.name: campaign_name
fields.description: Campaign name.

fields.name: special_industries
fields.description: Ad categories. Enum values: HOUSING : Ads for real estate listings, homeowners insurance, mortgage loans or other related opportunities. EMPLOYMENT : Ads for job offers, internships, professional certification programs or other related opportunities. CREDIT : Ads for credit card offers, auto loans, long-term financing or other related opportunities.

fields.name: adgroup_secondary_status
fields.description: Ad group status (Secondary status). For the supported adgroup secondary statuses for a certain primary status, see Supported secondary statuses for a primary status . It is equal to secondary_status in /adgroup/get/ .

fields.name: product_source
fields.description: Product source where you want to get products for promotion. Enum value: CATALOG (catalog).

fields.name: catalog_id
fields.description: The ID of the catalog to use in the Smart+ Catalog Ads.

fields.name: catalog_authorized_bc_id
fields.description: The ID of the Business Center that the catalog ( catalog_id ) belongs to.

fields.name: product_specific_type
fields.description: Different dimensions to choose products. Enum values: ALL : Allow TikTok to dynamically choose from all products. PRODUCT_SET : Specify a product set. TikTok will dynamically choose products from this set. CUSTOMIZED_PRODUCTS : Specify a customized number of products.

fields.name: product_set_id
fields.description: The ID of a product set.

fields.name: product_ids
fields.description: The product IDs of the catalog products.

fields.name: promotion_type
fields.description: Promotion type (Optimization location) and you can decide where you'd like to promote your products using this field. For value definitions, see Enumerations - Promotion Type .

fields.name: app_id
fields.description: The App ID of the app to promote. You can get app_id by using the /app/list/ endpoint.

fields.name: app_type
fields.description: The type of the promoted app. Currently, we support APP_ANDROID and APP_IOS .

fields.name: promotion_website_type
fields.description: TikTok Instant Page type. Currently, we only support TIKTOK_NATIVE_PAGE (To use TikTok Instant Page).

fields.name: promotion_target_type
fields.description: The optimization location for Lead Generation objective. Enum values: INSTANT_PAGE : Instant Form. To create a fast-loading in-app TikTok Instant Form to collect more leads. EXTERNAL_WEBSITE : Website Form. To use a landing page that has the Website Form or the TikTok Instant Page that redirects to the website with the Website Form to collect more leads.

fields.name: optimization_goal
fields.description: The measurable results that you'd like to drive your ads with. For enum values, see Enumeration - Optimization Goal .

fields.name: pixel_id
fields.description: Pixel ID.

fields.name: optimization_event
fields.description: Conversion event for the ad group. See Conversion events for more.

fields.name: app_config
fields.description: Returned when sales_destination is WEB_AND_APP . Details of the app or apps to promote.

fields.name: app_id
fields.description: The App ID of the app to promote.

fields.name: deep_funnel_optimization_status
fields.description: The status of deep funnel optimization. With deep funnel optimization, you can select a secondary event alongside the primary optimization event, which can help improve campaign effectiveness. Enum values: ON : enabled. OFF : disabled.

fields.name: deep_funnel_event_source
fields.description: Returned when deep_funnel_optimization_status is ON . The event source type. Enum values: PIXEL : Pixel. OFFLINE : Offline Event Set. CRM : CRM Event Set.

fields.name: deep_funnel_event_source_id
fields.description: Returned when deep_funnel_optimization_status is ON . Event Source ID. When deep_funnel_event_source is PIXEL , this field represents a Pixel ID. When deep_funnel_event_source is OFFLINE , this field represents an Offline Event Set ID. When deep_funnel_event_source is CRM , this field represents a CRM Event Set ID.

fields.name: deep_funnel_optimization_event
fields.description: Returned when deep_funnel_optimization_status is ON . Deep funnel optimization event. Example: SHOPPING .

fields.name: bid_type
fields.description: Bidding strategy. For enum values and their descriptions, see Enumeration - Bidding Strategy .

fields.name: bid_price
fields.description: The target cost per click. The system will aim to get the most results while keeping the average cost per result around or lower than the specified amount.

fields.name: conversion_bid_price
fields.description: The target cost per conversion or cost per landing page view. The system will aim to get the most results while keeping the average cost per result around or lower than the specified amount.

fields.name: deep_bid_type
fields.description: Bidding strategy for in-app events. For enum values and their descriptions, see Enumeration - Deep Event Bidding Strategy .

fields.name: roas_bid
fields.description: Target ROAS for Value-Based Optimization.

fields.name: vbo_window
fields.description: The time window of the specified bidding strategy for VBO IAA (Value-Based Optimization for in-app advertising) or VBO IAP (Value-Based Optimization for in-app purchase). Enum values: SEVEN_DAYS : The first seven days (day 7). ZERO_DAY : The current day (day 0).

fields.name: click_attribution_window
fields.description: Click-through window. This attribution window is the time between when a person clicks your ad and then takes an action. Enum values: OFF : Off. ONE_DAY : 1-day click. SEVEN_DAYS : 7-day click. FOURTEEN_DAYS : 14-day click. TWENTY_EIGHT_DAYS : 28-day click.

fields.name: view_attribution_window
fields.description: View-through window. This attribution window is the time between when a person views your ad and then takes an action. Enum values: OFF : Off. ONE_DAY : 1-day view. SEVEN_DAYS : 7-day view.

fields.name: engaged_view_attribution_window
fields.description: Engaged view-through window. This attribution window is the time after someone watches at least 6 seconds of your video ad that a conversion is counted. Enum values: ONE_DAY : 1-day engaged view. SEVEN_DAYS : 7-day engaged view. FOURTEEN_DAYS : 14-day engaged view. TWENTY_EIGHT_DAYS : 28-day engaged view.

fields.name: attribution_event_count
fields.description: Event count (Statistic type). The way that people's actions are counted after only viewing or clicking an ad. Enum values: UNSET : Unset. EVERY : Every. To count multiple events from someone as separate conversions. ONCE : Once. To count multiple events from someone as 1 conversion.

fields.name: billing_event
fields.description: Bid method. See Enumerations - Bid method for optional values.

fields.name: location_ids
fields.description: IDs of the locations that you want to target. Use Get locations to get available locations.

fields.name: languages
fields.description: Codes of the languages that you want to target. For the list of language codes supported, see Enumerations - Language Code .

fields.name: gender
fields.description: Gender that you want to target. Enum values: GENDER_FEMALE , GENDER_MALE , GENDER_UNLIMITED .

fields.name: spc_audience_age
fields.description: The age group that the campaign targets. Enum value: 18+ , 25+ . For campaigns with the LEAD_GENERATION objective (Smart+ Lead Generation Campaigns), the value of this field can be either 18+ or 25+ . For campaigns with the APP_PROMOTION objective (Smart+ App Campaigns) or WEB_CONVERSIONS objective (Smart+ Web Campaigns or Smart Performance Web Campaigns), the value of this field can only be 18+ . Note : Currently, creating Smart+ Lead Generation Campaigns via API is not supported. To filter existing Smart+ Lead Generation Campaigns with the LEAD_GENERATION objective within your ad account, call /campaign/get/ and set filtering to {"objective_type":"LEAD_GENERATION", "is_smart_performance_campaign": true} .

fields.name: exclude_age_under_eighteen
fields.description: Whether to exclude the group aged under eighteen.

fields.name: excluded_audience_ids
fields.description: List of audience IDs to be excluded.

fields.name: placement_type
fields.description: The placement strategy that decides where your ads will be shown. Currently, we support PLACEMENT_TYPE_NORMAL and PLACEMENT_TYPE_AUTOMATIC .

fields.name: placements
fields.description: The apps where you want to deliver your ads. Currently, we support PLACEMENT_TIKTOK and PLACEMENT_PANGLE .

fields.name: comment_disabled
fields.description: Whether to allow comments on your ads on TikTok.

fields.name: share_disabled
fields.description: Whether sharing to third-party platforms is disabled for ads in this ad group.

fields.name: video_download_disabled
fields.description: Whether users can download your video ads on TikTok.

fields.name: blocked_pangle_app_ids
fields.description: Pangle app block ID list.

fields.name: brand_safety_type
fields.description: Inventory filter tier for the Smart+ Campaign. Enum values: EXPANDED_INVENTORY : Expanded inventory. Your ads will not appear next to explicitly inappropriate content, but they may appear next to content that features mature themes. STANDARD_INVENTORY : Standard inventory. Your ads will appear next to content that is appropriate for most brands. LIMITED_INVENTORY : Limited inventory. Your ads will not appear next to content that contains mature themes. NO_BRAND_SAFETY : Full inventory without using any brand safety solution, which means your ads may appear next to some content featuring mature themes. Note : The setting is automatically applied based on your Brand Safety Hub configurations. To retrieve the details of such settings for your ad account, use /tiktok_inventory_filters/get/ .

fields.name: category_exclusion_ids
fields.description: The ID list of content categories that you want to avoid showing the Smart+ Campaign next to. To obtain the details of these content categories based on category IDs, use /tool/content_exclusion/info/ . Note : The setting is automatically applied based on your Brand Safety Hub configurations. To retrieve the details of such settings for your ad account, use /tiktok_inventory_filters/get/ .

fields.name: budget_mode
fields.description: Budget mode. See Enumerations-Budget Mode .

fields.name: budget
fields.description: Campaign budget.

fields.name: scheduled_budget
fields.description: Scheduled campaign budget for the next day. A value not equal to 0 means the scheduled budget is set and the value represents the budget; a value of 0 means the scheduled budget is not set.

fields.name: schedule_type
fields.description: Schedule type. Currently, we support SCHEDULE_START_END and SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW .

fields.name: schedule_start_time
fields.description: Ad delivery start time, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0).

fields.name: schedule_end_time
fields.description: Ad delivery end time, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0).

fields.name: dayparting
fields.description: Ad delivery arrangement, in the format of a string that consists of 48 x 7 characters. Each character is mapped to a 30-minute timeframe from Monday to Sunday. Each character can be set to either 0 or 1. 1 represents delivery in the 30-minute timeframe, and 0 stands for non-delivery in the 30-minute timeframe. The first character is mapped to 0:01-0:30 of Monday; The second character is mapped to 0:31-1:00 of Monday, and the last character represents 23:31-0:00 Sunday. Note : Not specified, all-0, or all-1 are considered as full-time delivery.

fields.name: skip_learning_phase
fields.description: Whether to skip the learning phase.

fields.name: identity_id
fields.description: Identity ID when you are not using Spark Ads.

fields.name: identity_type
fields.description: Identity type when you are not using Spark Ads. Enum value: CUSTOMIZED_USER .

fields.name: app_download_url
fields.description: App download link.

fields.name: app_name
fields.description: The display name of the app download ad.

fields.name: media_info_list
fields.description: List of media information.

fields.name: ad_material_id
fields.description: The ad material ID for the creative within the campaign. An ad material ID is an ad-specific material ID generated when a particular creative is used in an ad. This ID differs from the creative ID that you obtain when uploading the creative to your ad accountâ€™s Creative Library.

fields.name: material_operation_status
fields.description: The status of the creative. Enum values: DISABLE : The creative is disabled (in 'OFF' status). ENABLE : The creative is enabled (in 'ON' status).

fields.name: media_info
fields.description: Material information.

fields.name: image_info
fields.description: Image information.

fields.name: web_uri
fields.description: Image ID.

fields.name: video_info
fields.description: Video information.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: Video ID.

fields.name: file_name
fields.description: Video name.

fields.name: music_info
fields.description: Music information.

fields.name: music_id
fields.description: The ID of the piece of music to use in the Carousel Ads.

fields.name: aigc_disclosure_type
fields.description: Whether to turn on the AIGC (Artificial Intelligence Generated Content) self-disclosure toggle to indicate the ad contains AI-generated content. After the toggle is turned on, your ad will carry an "Advertiser labeled as Al-generated" label when viewed in full. Enum values: SELF_DISCLOSURE : To turn on the toggle to declare that the ad contains AI-generated content. NOT_DECLARED : To not declare that the ad contains AI-generated content.

fields.name: tiktok_item_id
fields.description: The ID of the TikTok post to be used as an ad (Spark Ad).

fields.name: identity_type
fields.description: Identity type when you use Spark Ads. Enum values: AUTH_CODE , TT_USER , BC_AUTH_TT . For details about identities, see Identities .

fields.name: identity_id
fields.description: Identity ID when you use Spark Ads.

fields.name: identity_authorized_bc_id
fields.description: Returned when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT . ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

fields.name: dark_post_status
fields.description: The status of the "Ads-only mode" for your creatives. Enum values: ON : Enable the ads-only mode to limit your posts to paid traffic. OFF : Disable the ads-only mode. The post will appear on your TikTok profile and will be eligible to receive organic traffic.

fields.name: catalog_creative_toggle
fields.description: Whether to enable auto-selection of creatives from your catalog. Supported values: true , false . If you set this field to true , the system will use catalog creatives to automatically generate ads in diverse formats such as catalog video, catalog carousel, and single video.

fields.name: title_list
fields.description: List of ad titles (also called ad texts). Ad titles are shown to your audience as part of your ad creative, to deliver the message you intend to communicate to them.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Ad title (ad text).

fields.name: call_to_action_id
fields.description: The ID of the CTA portfolio that you want to use in your ads.

fields.name: call_to_action_list
fields.description: Call-to-action list.

fields.name: call_to_action
fields.description: Call-to-action text. For enum values, see Enumeration - Call-to-action .

fields.name: product_info
fields.description: Additional product information. This information will be used to create ad variations to help achieve advertising goals such as standing out, building trust, or boosting performance.

fields.name: promo_info_list
fields.description: Valid only in regular Smart+ Web Campaigns . Details of promo codes and offers. Promo codes and offers can help boost your ad performance. Make sure your codes and offers are active, accurate, and ready to use at checkout.

fields.name: discount_type
fields.description: Returned when promo_info_list is specified. Discount type. Enum values: PERCENTAGE : Percentage off discount. CASH : Cash off discount.

fields.name: discount_value
fields.description: Returned when promo_info_list is specified. Discount value. When discount_type is PERCENTAGE , this field will be an integer between 1-100. When discount_type is CASH , this field will be a float greater than 0.

fields.name: discount_currency
fields.description: Returned when discount_type is CASH . Discount currency. For enum values, see List of values for discount_currency or minimum_purchase_currency .

fields.name: minimum_purchase_type
fields.description: Minimum purchase type. Enum values: QUANTITY : Minimum quantity. SUBTOTAL : Minimum subtotal.

fields.name: minimum_purchase_value
fields.description: Returned when minimum_purchase_type is specified. Minimum purchase value. When minimum_purchase_type is QUANTITY , this field will be an integer that is 0 or greater. When minimum_purchase_type is SUBTOTAL , this field will be a float greater than 0.

fields.name: minimum_purchase_currency
fields.description: Returned when minimum_purchase_type is SUBTOTAL . Minimum purchase currency. For enum values, see List of values for discount_currency or minimum_purchase_currency .

fields.name: valid_start_time
fields.description: Valid start time (UTC+0) for the promo code or offer, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS .

fields.name: valid_end_time
fields.description: Valid end time (UTC+0) for the promo code or offer, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS .

fields.name: card_list
fields.description: Creative portfolio ID list.

fields.name: card_id
fields.description: Creative portfolio ID.

fields.name: automatic_add_on_enabled
fields.description: Whether to enable auto-selection of interactive add-ons. Supported values: true , false . If you set this field to true , the system will automatically apply the most suitable interactive add-ons to your ads.

fields.name: page_list
fields.description: Page ID list.

fields.name: page_id
fields.description: Page ID.

fields.name: deeplink
fields.description: The specific location where you want your audience to go if they have your app installed.

fields.name: deeplink_type
fields.description: The deeplink type.

fields.name: landing_page_urls
fields.description: Landing page URL list.

fields.name: landing_page_url
fields.description: Landing page URL.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: Returned when the campaign is in multiple landing page mode. Video ID.

fields.name: tiktok_item_id
fields.description: Returned when the campaign is in multiple landing page mode. The ID of the TikTok post to be used as an ad (Spark Ad).

fields.name: utm_params
fields.description: A list of URL parameters. URL parameters are snippets of code that can be added to the end of the URLs to help you track clicks across different channels and understand how visitors interact with a website through third-party analytics platforms. They consist of key-value pairs that are specified through key and value .

fields.name: key
fields.description: The URL parameter. The parameter can be a custom parameter or a UTM parameter. The supported UTM parameters are: utm_source : The app, site, etc., that brings traffic to your website. For example: TikTok. utm_medium : The advertising or marketing medium. For example: cpm, cpc, banner, and video. utm_content : The creative content used for promotion. For example: ad name, CTA text, asset, and color. utm_campaign : The individual campaign name, slogan, or promo code. For example: BlackFridayProm. Note that UTM parameters are case-sensitive.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value of the URL parameter. The value can be a custom value or the name of a macro. The supported macros are: __CAMPAIGN_NAME__ : This will be replaced by your campaign name. __CAMPAIGN_ID__ : This will be replaced by your campaign ID. __AID_NAME__ : This will be replaced by your ad group name. __AID__ : This will be replaced by your ad group ID. __CID_NAME__ : This will be replaced by your ad name. __CID__ : This will be replaced by your ad ID. __PLACEMENT__ : This will be replaced by your placement.

fields.name: disclaimer_info
fields.description: Details of the disclaimer.

fields.name: disclaimer_type
fields.description: The type of disclaimer that you want to add to the ad. Enum values: TEXT_LINK : clickable disclaimers. TEXT_ONLY : text-only disclaimers.

fields.name: disclaimer_text
fields.description: Returned when disclaimer_type is TEXT_ONLY . The text-only disclaimer that you want to add to the ad.

fields.name: text
fields.description: The disclaimer text. Length limit: 90 characters.

fields.name: disclaimer_clickable_texts
fields.description: Returned when disclaimer_type is TEXT_LINK . The clickable disclaimer or clickable disclaimers that you want to add to the ad.

fields.name: text
fields.description: The disclaimer text. Length limit: 40 characters.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL for the clickable disclaimer. When users tap each text, they will be redirected to the URL and see more disclaimer details.

fields.name: tracking_app_id
fields.description: The ID of the app that is measured.

fields.name: impression_tracking_url
fields.description: Default Impression Tracking URL.

fields.name: click_tracking_url
fields.description: Click Tracking URL.

fields.name: app_tracking_info_list
fields.description: Details of Third-party tracking settings.

fields.name: app_type
fields.description: Returned when app_tracking_info_list is specified. App type. Enum values: APP_ANDROID : Android App. APP_IOS : iOS App.

fields.name: app_id
fields.description: Returned when app_tracking_info_list is specified. The App ID of the App. When app_type is APP_ANDROID , this field represents the App ID for an Android App. When app_type is APP_IOS , this field represents the App ID for an iOS App.

fields.name: impression_tracking_url
fields.description: Impression tracking URL. When app_type is APP_ANDROID , this field represents an impression tracking URL for Android. When app_type is APP_IOS , this field represents an impression tracking URL for Android.

fields.name: click_tracking_url
fields.description: Click tracking URL. When app_type is APP_ANDROID , this field represents a click tracking URL for Android. When app_type is APP_IOS , this field represents a click tracking URL for Android.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: The time when the campaign was created, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0).

fields.name: modify_time
fields.description: The time when the campaign was modified, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0).

example.body:
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "OK",
    "request_id": "{{request_id}}",
    "data": {
        "list": [        
       { "campaign_id": "{{campaign_id}}",
        "advertiser_id": "{{advertiser_id}}",
        "app_id": "{{app_id}}",
        "pixel_id": null,
        "app_type": "APP_ANDROID",
        "objective_type": "APP_PROMOTION",
        "campaign_name": "{{campaign_name}}",
        "is_smart_performance_campaign": true,
        "operation_status": "ENABLE",
        "campaign_secondary_status": "CAMPAIGN_STATUS_ENABLE",
        "adgroup_secondary_status": "ADGROUP_STATUS_CREATE",
        "campaign_type": "REGULAR_CAMPAIGN",
        "app_promotion_type": "APP_INSTALL",
        "optimization_goal": "CLICK",
        "bid_type": "BID_TYPE_NO_BID",
        "deep_bid_type": null,
        "skip_learning_phase": null,
        "budget": {{budget}},
        "budget_mode": "BUDGET_MODE_DAY",
        "scheduled_budget": {{scheduled_budget}},
        "promotion_type": "APP_ANDROID",
        "optimization_event": "ACTIVE",
        "placements": [
            "PLACEMENT_TIKTOK"
        ],
        "placement_type": "PLACEMENT_TYPE_NORMAL",
        "promotion_website_type": null,
        "comment_disabled": true,
        "share_disabled": true,
        "video_download_disabled": true,
        "location_ids": [
            "{{location_ids}}"
        ],
        "languages": [
            "{{languages}}"
        ],
        "exclude_age_under_eighteen": false,
        "excluded_audience_ids": null,
        "blocked_pangle_app_ids": null,
        "special_industries": null,
        "schedule_type": "SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW",
        "schedule_start_time": "2024-04-17 22:00:00",
        "schedule_end_time": "2034-04-15 22:00:00",
        "dayparting": "",
        "billing_event": "CPC",
        "app_download_url": "{{app_download_url}}",
        "app_name": "{{app_name}}",
        "call_to_action_id": null,
        "call_to_action_list": [
            {
                "call_to_action": "INSTALL_NOW"
            },
            {
                "call_to_action": "DOWNLOAD_NOW"
            }
        ],
        "media_info_list": [
            {
                "media_info": {
                    "video_info": {
                        "video_id": "{{video_id}}",
                        "file_name": "{{file_name}}"
                    },
                    "identity_id": null,
                    "image_info": [
                        {
                            "web_uri": "{{web_uri}}"
                        }
                    ],
                    "identity_type": null,
                    "tiktok_item_id": null
                }
            }
        ],
        "title_list": [
            {
                "title": "{{title}}"
            },
            {
                "title": "{{title}}"
            }
        ],
        "page_list": null,
        "card_list": null,
        "landing_page_urls": null,
